meaningMnemonic:
When a <kanji>person</kanji> goes <kanji>into</kanji> a place (then another person goes into the place, and then another person and another person), that place eventually gets filled with a <vocabulary>crowd of people</vocabulary>.

Note that this word is more commonly written 人混み.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from the word 人 and the kanji 込. Just keep in mind that the こ changes to ご and you'll be fine.
